only-authorized.description: Whether only authorized players can use img2brick commands

authorized-users.description: List of players who can always img2brick commands

max-size.description: Maximum width or height of images to brickify

quilt-mode.description: A mode where every image uploaded is on a quilt-size grid

quilt-size.description: Size of the quilt grid, images must have dimensions a multiple of this. Min: 8
